p: Sera were evaluated at multiple time points following vaccination and challenge. No measurable neutralizing antibodies were detected in the mock-vaccinated group after inoculation, however, neutralizing antibody titres were observed in all five animals by 11 dpc, with the highest levels observed at 21 dpc ( Figure 4A). Following vaccination with LSD-RVF.mf, LSDV-specific virus neutralizing antibodies were detected as early as 11 dpi in animals A1-2 and A1-5 ( Figure 4B). All five animals sero-converted by 17 dpi. A significant increase in titres were observed following challenge in three animals by 14 dpc.
